threads: The situation in Ukraine is deeply concerning. We must support our allies and stand against any aggression. The strength of our military is crucial in maintaining peace and safeguarding our national security. Praying for a peaceful resolution to this conflict.
text: @anarchist_kid: u r so blind bro. ukraine ppl r suffering under capitalist oppression. western powers r just trying to protect their interests. we need revolution, not more war. smash the state!

persona.name: Male College Student Internet Language Devils Advocate Radical Left
